trends: There have been no other sightings in Waverly
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw orange orb moving in SE direction in night sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw star-like orange orb approx. 30 - 40 degrees above horizon, moving in SE direction in night sky. Boyfriend noticed first while sitting on patio and called me to come and look at it. It moved in a horizontal line from East to South East direction. I had never seen an orange orb floating in the sky before, could not identify what this was. It disappeared behind a tree, so it must have kept moving in a south eastern direction.
